about:
I love playing at Avicus, but i hate it when they're banning wrong person >:(
like my friend, i know he cant use nodus, BUT he got banned because he attack with someone who hacking and cheating!
plus, i'm spawnkilling, yes. BUT penguindestiny, who cheating, HE spawnkilling with me AND he can kill someone with JUST 1 hit kill
i got banned, he does not get banned! i can accept, if i get banned because i does not follow the rules, but penguindestiny? 
HE DID NOT GET BANNED!
where's the law?
:( >:(
